definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Affect when haemorrhage when two side, appear two flank paralysis and limb atony the gender breaks down.
sentences.chinese: 当出血波及两侧时，出现两侧面瘫和四肢弛缓性瘫痪。

sentences.english: Objective The study focused on the therapeutic effectiveness of abdominal acupuncture in treating idiopathic facial paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究腹针治疗特发性面瘫的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Expressional focus is right paralysis of side bottom face, the mouth is only askew , and without the eye askew .
sentences.chinese: 表现病灶对侧下部面瘫，只有嘴歪斜，而无眼歪斜。

sentences.english: To observe the clinical effect of acupuncture 3-step therapy on peripheral facial paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 总结针刺三步疗法治疗周围性面瘫的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the causes of facial palsies after ablating parotid glands.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析126例腮腺切除后产生面瘫的原因。

sentences.english: The standardization of care across the rehabilitation of patients with facial paralysis in patients with better results.
sentences.chinese: 规范化的康复护理对面瘫患者的康复具有更好的疗效。

sentences.english: In a Chinese medicine clinique two patients who suffer from prosopoplegia are using hair dryers to cure themselves.
sentences.chinese: 中医诊所里，两位面瘫患者用电吹风自我进行热疗。

sentences.english: Master the diagnosis, treatment and prognosis of facial paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 中枢性及周围性面瘫的鉴别诊断。

sentences.english: Conclusion The curative effect of acupuncture on the muscle meridian theory is better than that of routine acupuncture.
sentences.chinese: 结论运用经筋理论治疗面瘫效果优于常规针灸治疗。

definition: reserved/aloof/(geography) (of a location) elevated and cold
(slang) (pun on 神經病|神经病[shen2 jing1 bing4]) crazy person/nutjob
(neologism) strange behavior characteristic of a teenager going through puberty (loanword from Japanese "chūnibyō")
handsome high-powered businessman (a type of character in an eponymous genre of romantic fiction who typically has a soft spot for a girl of lower social status)
to be smitten with sb/love-struck fool/starry-eyed infatuation
